channel.title: MarkVopat tweets
channel.description: A feed of recent tweets from MarkVopat.

item.description: Strange…a guy who kills 6 people and injures 24 with a “high powered rifle” taken into custody unharmed. Guy who takes a single shot from a moving car and then flees, on foot and unarmed is shot 60 times. Wonder why the different outcome? https://t.co/EFctfGMDVS
@annaems00 @beestang61 @SenSherrodBrown @ByGeorgeThomas Then perhaps the protocol needs to be changed.

@annaems00 @beestang61 @SenSherrodBrown @ByGeorgeThomas TN v. Garner doesn't justify shooting a fleeing suspect 60 times. Since they initially attempted to tase him, it seems they didn't view him as a serious threat which negates one of the disjuncts in Garner. Fleeing through an empty field also isn't a threat to public safety.

@annaems00 @beestang61 @SenSherrodBrown @ByGeorgeThomas Yes, from the car where he left the gun. The officers attempted to tase him when he ran from the vehicle. If he was a gun-toting threat, why a taser? 90 shots fired and 60 hits against an unarmed man.
@beestang61 @SenSherrodBrown @ByGeorgeThomas According to the Chief of Police he did not fire on police while fleeing. In fact, he did not have a gun on him when he was shot.
The January 6 Committee Is Going to Have the Final Word - The Atlantic https://t.co/QvE8ImZtdi

@EttoreSoftware TypIt4Me constantly stops working. I have granted it all permissions, but it will just suddenly stop working and only a total reboot of my MacBookPro seems top fix the problem. https://t.co/3XVIVxzD0m

Turned the radio on in the car for the first time in a long time and was happy to hear that WMJI Majic doesn’t (yet) consider the music of my college years in the 90s “oldies” (reserves that category for the 70s and 80s).
